title: The River
creator_credit: United States. Dept. of Agriculture and Pare Lorentz
brief_description: A classic documentary in the history of film, noted for its vivid imagery, outstanding musical score and verse commentary. The film traces life in the Mississippi River Valley during the past 150 years before the American Government legislated for flood control. A graphic portrayal of the consequences of sharecropping, soil degradation, unchecked soil erosion and flooding.
